name: Fish Food!
description:
Choose your fish and help them eat various foods until they're full. I made this very simple game for my young kids to sharpen their hand-eye coordination.  No time limit, no stress, just float around and feed your fish! 

Art and Sound:

https://kenney.nl/

https://opengameart.org/

Note:

Source code is available. Made in Godot.

Feel free to comment or message with any bugs.
